title: Sabrent USB powered Slim Notebook Cooler with 3 80MM Fans (FAN-CLFN)
description: The Sabrent FAN-CLFN  USB-Powered 3-Fan Notebook Cooler keeps your notebook cool. It features  three (3) built-in 80mm fans for easy thermal heat dissipation, keeping  your notebook from getting too hot. The fans quietly whir the heat away  from your laptop at a rate of 300 RPM, producing 30 CFM of airflow. Hot  air is sucked in from the bottom of the laptop and exhausted through the  opening on the rear. It is powered by connecting to a single USB port,  and it is equipped with an On/Off Switch, plus 3 LED’s indicate working  status of the 3 fans. The Notebook Cooler weighs only 1 lb and fits  easily in most laptop carrying cases.
